name: Maternity Benefit
inclusion_criteria: ((fm.gender='MALE' AND fm.age >= 21) OR (fm.gender='FEMALE' AND fm.age >= 18)) AND (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.marital_status IN ('Married')) AND (fm.pregnancy_status IN ('Delivered first child', 'Delivered second child')) AND (fm.number_of_children >= 1) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Compensation in case of miscarriage
inclusion_criteria: (fm.age > (CASE WHEN fm.gender='MALE' THEN 21 ELSE 18 END)) AND (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.marital_status IN ('Married')) AND (fm.pregnancy_status IN ('Miscarriage/ Still born')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Medical Assistance
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status IN ('Hospitalised for more than 5 days','In plaster at residence')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Education Assistance(School)
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.number_of_children >= 1)  AND (fm.children_school_or_college IN ('school')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Education Assistance(College)
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.number_of_children >= 1)  AND (fm.children_school_or_college IN ('college')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Old Age Pension Benefit
inclusion_criteria: (fm.age > 60) AND (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status NOT IN ('Deceased')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 3)

name: Disability Pension
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status IN ('Permanent disability as per disability certificate')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Compensation for Disability
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status IN ('Permanent disability as per disability certificate')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Family Pension
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status IN ('Deceased')) AND (fm.spouse_alive = TRUE) AND (fm.occupation_of_surviving_spouse IN ('Pensioner')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 1)

name: Funeral Assistance
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status IN ('Deceased')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Compensation in case of Death (Accident/Natural Death)
inclusion_criteria: (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.health_status IN ('Deceased')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 0)

name: Loan for purchase of work tools
inclusion_criteria: (fm.age < 55) AND (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 3)

name: Grant for purchase of work-related tools
inclusion_criteria: (fm.age < 55) AND (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 3)

name: Advance for purchase or construction of the house
inclusion_criteria: (fm.age < 50) AND (fm.occupation IN ('Construction Worker')) AND (fm.home_ownership_status IN ('Home Owner','Going to Purchase')) AND (DATEDIFF('YEAR', fm.bocw_card_registration_date, current_date()) >= 5)
